channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Witch (NK)
channel.description:
Changes - - frame now makes the victim appear as a magic user - phase 1 changed from appears as a magic user to cannot vote - "stone mist" is now "enslave soul"
The witch is slow paced Neutral Killing class, That observes the chaos breaking out as the kingdom slowly crumbles to pieces.
The witch is a magic user, meaning the inquisitor can come into play, the inquisitor now also spawns in when there is a witch in game, **and no there cannot be a witch and a sorcerer**
**Passive: Soul Potion** - Immune to death, poison, and bleeding
**Day Ability: Frame** - Make a player appear as unseen/cult tonight, also appears as a magic user to the inquisitor
**Day Ability**: **Molten Potion** (x2) - Force a player to drink a potion that makes them slowly rot, this has three phases, The molten potion can only be healed by an Alchemist or Physician in the first phase, if it's not the first phase, the Healer will push them back a phase. **Phase 1:** This happens the first day/night they drink the potion, the player cannot vote. **Phase 2:** This happens the Day/night after the player drinks the potion, the cannot use any of their abilities. **Phase 3:** This happens three days after they drank the potion, they are unable to speak. tonight they will die if not healed.
**Night Ability: Drain** - Make a player die the next night, Cannot be healed
**Night Ability: Enslave Soul (x3)-** Use a dead players ability on someone
